title: Cumin and coriander chickpea salad
ingredients: ['2 cloves garlic, minced', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '7 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1 dessertspoon white wine vinegar', '1 knob root ginger, grated', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '5 (400g) tins chickpeas, drained', '2 yellow peppers, seeded and chopped', '1 bunch spring onions, thinly sliced', 'good handful finely chopped fresh coriander']
